com.jensen.yatzy.model

Class Yatzy

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jensen.yatzy.model.Yatzy

  • public class Yatzy
extends java.lang.Object
    Yatzy class holds the state of the game and check the points so they get filled in the right combination index.
    Author:
    Benjamin Rosman

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Yatzy()
      The constructor loops through the dice array and sets the default value of the dices
